name: Chernobyl Chad
description:
The people who stayed in chernobyl after the nuclear accident gave birth to a generation of mutants. The government wants to get rid of the mutants for pr purposes so they hired you to capture them.

-HOW TO PLAY-
Drive around the map to collect mutants. Grab one and release it over the vans hatch that opens when holding one. Drive back to the garage before your fuel runs out to collect the money from your collected mutants. Upgrade the car with the money you receive.

-CONTROLS-
Move [WASD]
Aim [Mouse]
Grab/Release Mutant [LMB]
Reset Car [R]
